name: Introduction to Computer Science
description: A foundational course in computer science principles, including basic programming concepts.

name: Data Structures
description: Covers fundamental data structures such as lists, trees, and graphs.

name: Programming Paradigms
description: Explores different programming paradigms like functional and object-oriented.

name: Discrete Mathematics
description: Covers mathematical foundations for computer science, including logic, sets, and graph theory.

name: Introduction to Differential Equations
description: An introduction to the theory, solution, and application of ordinary differential equations.

name: Introduction to Computer Organization
description: Covers machine organization, instruction set architecture, and basic hardware components.

name: Software Engineering Senior Design
description: A capstone project course focusing on software engineering principles and teamwork.
